data.title: Summitville, New York Sales Tax Rate (2024)
data.meta_description: Look up 2024 sales tax rates for Summitville, New York, and surrounding areas. Tax rates are provided by Avalara and updated monthly.
data.text:
Sales tax rates are determined by exact street address. The jurisdiction-specific rates shown add up to your minimum combined sales tax rate. The total rate for your specific address could be more.

Need the exact sales tax rate for your address?

The minimum combined 2024 sales tax rate for Summitville, New York is . This is the total of state, county and city sales tax rates. The New York sales tax rate is currently %. The County sales tax rate is %. The Summitville sales tax rate is %.

The outbreak of COVID-19 (caused by the coronavirus) may have impacted sales tax filing due dates in Summitville. Please consult your local tax authority for specific details. For more information, visit our ongoing coverage of the virus and its impact on sales tax compliance.

Automating sales tax compliance can help your business keep compliant with changing sales tax laws in New York and beyond. AvaTax delivers real-time sales tax rates and uses advanced technology to map rates to exact address locations, based on the latest jurisdiction requirements.
